name: LG HDTV
description: The best in entertainment. Access a world of movies, TV and apps, and enjoy every moment in picture quality that goes beyond Full HD. With X-Reality PRO, you will enjoy stunning clarity, sharpness and a more refined picture.

name: SONY HDTV
description: Features an advanced LED Backlight Design which produces a wider color range Local Dimming along with the Black Graduation Drive to delivery great blacks in your video Super Bright Panel helping to brighten up the content XUMO Discovery Screen.
